channel.title: [317 - DELTA] Changing brightness? [Rep++]

item.title: [317 - DELTA] Changing brightness? [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Okay so right now none of my players can change their brightness.

When they click to change it, it shows me the clickmost ID.

My clickmost.java codes:

case 74205: c.brightness = 3; break; case 74204: c.brightness = 2; break; case 74203: c.brightness = 1; break;

but like I said, when they click it, the brightness doesnâ€™t change.

any ideas?
Rep++ for any help.
